title: Free Software, Free People
description:
Four years after the Arab Spring & 2 years after Snowden, little has
changed. What now? This talk will remember Telecomix, an ad-hoc activist
cluster that supported free communication around the world. Stories of
humans and machines, reflection on 3 years of hacktivism & exploration
of similarities to the free software community. It follows a 2011 Pycon
lightning talk given after Tahrir Square.
